text: Phir hum ney unn logon ko (iss) kitab ka waris banaya jin ko hum ney apnay bandon mein say pasand farmaya. Phir baazay to inn mein apni jano per zulm kerney walay hain aur baazay inn mein mutawassit darjay kay hain aur baazay inn mein Allah ki tofiq say nekiyon mein taraqqi kiye chalay jatay hain. Yeh bara fazal hai
